settings.text:
Estimated Delivery Time:
Projector: 14 days after placing order.
Floor Rising Screen: 30 days after placing order.
• AWOL Pays your sales tax. Taxes are built into AWOL Visions prices, saving you hundreds of dollars per order.

•Tax-Inclusive, Save Around $200 For You

•Better Price and Service in Buy With Prime
Lead time is 90 working days. Delivery is to the fist available dry area. Inside delivery and setup is not included.

settings.title: FREE SHIPPING
settings.dialog_context:
Shipping fee

USA excluded Alaska and Hawaii

For products like projectors, screens and accessories, it is free standard shipment and the delivery time is  3-4 business days after the order is processed.

For products like Smart cabinet and  Vanish Rollable Laser TV, the shipping fee is from $150-$500 depending on the size and the style. The delivery time is 90 days after the order is processed.

Other US states, territories, and other countries

For products like projectors, screens, and accessories, the shipping fee is as follows:

Australia: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Canada: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-10 business days.

EU & UK: $100 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 business days.

Hong Kong & Macao SAR: Free standard shipping and delivery time is 6-18 days.

View more >

settings.title: AWOL’S COMMITMENTS
settings.dialog_context:
Free Return within 30 days

Undamaged products may be returned for a full refund for any reason within 30 days of the delivery date. Once the returned item arrives back in Awol Vision’s warehouse 16 Technology Dr, Suite 133, Irvine, CA 92618 for inspection, the refund process will begin.

View more >

24 Month Hassle-Free Warranty

Elevation Technology Partners (AWOL Vision) warrants our products to be free from defects in workmanship and materials, under normal residential or commercial use and conditions, for a period as listed below.
Laser TV / Projectors/Screens: 1-year limited warranty & 1-year free extended warranty (total 2-year warranty)
Smart Cabinets: 5 years on the cabinet; 2 years on mechanical and electrical components
Accessories: 1-year limited warranty

60 Days Price Match Guarantee

AWOL guarantees that we will refund you the difference if you find a lower price from us within 30 days of your purchase.

Lifetime Customer Support

We are committed to providing lifelong customer service support, so if you need help, please contact us.

settings.context:
In both upper corners of the image, the focus and clarity are
close to perfection, you can almost see the pixels appearing
when you get too close.

The color palette and behavior is handled flawlessly
whether it’s for SDR or HDR content.

With Dolby Vision, AWOL is the only RGB UST
projector in the market that offers Dolby Vision,
HDR 10+, Dolby Atmos, and Active 3D, It stands
out as the most comprehensive ultra-short
throw RGB laser projector available.

Better than IMAX 3D, you will experience
an immersive ''journey'' with a movie.

Exhibits the lowest-ever large screen time lag of 8ms
to ensure that all your gaming action is real-time.

By employing advanced height virtualization techniques
on top of traditional stereo, AWOL deliver an Immersion
audio experience.

The implementation of Laser dimming technology
has greatly improved contrast, leading to a
significant enhancement in image quality.

settings.headTitle:
Elevate your entertainment with a
screen that rises from the ground

settings.title: Q1: Is the Cinematic+ motorized projector screen suitable for high-resolution content?
settings.answer: Yes, the screen supports 4K and 8K resolutions as well as HDR content, ensuring sharp and vibrant images for all types of media.

settings.title: Q2: What sizes and features distinguish the Cinematic+ ALR motorized floor rising projector screen?
settings.answer: Available in 100" and 120" models, the Cinematic+ screen features a motorized, floor-rising design that enhances home theaters. Ideal for ultra-short throw projectors, it enhances any home theater with its ambient light rejecting capabilities, ensuring clear and vibrant visuals in various lighting conditions.

settings.title: Q3: Does the Cinematic+ motorized floor rising projector screen support 3D projection?
settings.answer: Yes. The Cinematic+ motorized floor rising screen excels in 3D projection, utilizing its peek 0.8dB gain surface to amplify image brightness and depth. It creates a vivid and immersive 3D viewing experience, perfect for realistic and detailed visuals in your home theater.

settings.title: Q4: What comes included with the Cinematic+ Motorized Floor Rising Screen?
settings.answer: The Cinematic+ includes an RF wireless remote for effortless control from anywhere in the room, a USB synchronized trigger for seamless operation with your projector, a non-slip mat for stable placement, and a power cord.

settings.title: Q5: How does the motorized floor rising feature enhance the projection experience?
settings.answer: The motorized floor rising feature of the Cinematic+ Screen allows for easy, remote-controlled setup and storage, boosting convenience and keeping your space sleek and uncluttered.

settings.title: Q6: How do I install the Cinematic+ motorized floor rising screen?
settings.answer: Setting up the motorized floor rising screen is designed to be user-friendly. It comes with all necessary assembly hardware included, making setup straightforward and convenient right out of the box. Just follow the manual to correctly align and secure the screen, making it ready for use in no time.

settings.title: Q7: Can I use the screen with other brand projectors?
settings.answer: Absolutely! The AWOL Vision Cinematic+ Motorized Projection Screen is compatible with various ultra-short throw projectors. For an optimal cinematic experience, we recommend pairing it with the LTV-3500 Pro, which provides stunning image quality and smart home integration for effortless operation.

settings.title: Q8: How should I maintain the Cinematic+ motorized floor rising projector screen?
settings.answer: To keep your Cinematic+ Screen in top condition, dust it regularly with a soft microfiber cloth. For any marks or stains, use a cloth slightly dampened with a mild soap solution, and always wipe horizontally to protect the screen's surface. Avoid harsh chemicals to prevent damage.

settings.title: Q9: Is the screen material durable and flame retardant?
settings.answer: Yes, the Cinematic+ motorized floor rising screen is made from high-quality, flame-retardant materials, ensuring safety, durability, and long-lasting performance in various environments.

settings.title: Q10: How do I adjust the height settings on the Cinematic+ Motorized Screen?
settings.answer:
Adjust the screen height using the remote, and save your preferred setting with the remote's memory function. For custom height limits:

1. Hold the up or down button for 5 seconds until you hear a beep.
2. Fine-tune the position using the remote.
3. Wait 30 seconds, and the screen will save the new maximum limit automatically and overwrite the previous setting.

settings.title: Q11: Can I integrate the motorized Cinematic+ screen into a smart home system?
settings.answer: Yes. Pair it with the USB Synchronized Trigger for automated control. When connected to a projector like the LTV-3500 Pro, which supports smart home integration, the screen will automatically rise when powered on and lower when powered off, seamlessly fitting into connected home systems.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
